original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ca paribbājakā ca sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti. Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā te acchindiṁsu.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū ca paribbājakā ca sāketā sāvatthim addhāna magga ppaṭipannāḥ honti antarāmagge corāḥ nikkhamitvā te acchindisu

original: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā te core sabhaṇḍe gahetvā bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pāhesuṁ—
analyzed: sāvatthiyāḥ rāja bhaṭāḥ nikkhamitvā te core sa bhaṇḍe gahetvā bhikkhūnam santike dūtam pāhesu

original: “āgacchantu, bhadantā, sakaṁ sakaṁ cīvaraṁ sañjānitvā gaṇhantū”ti.
analyzed: āgacchantu bhadantā sakam sakam cīvaram sañjānitvā gaṇhantu uti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā attano attano cīvaraṁ na sañjānissantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhadantāḥ attanaḥ attanaḥ cīvaram na sañjānissanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ tadanucchavikaṁ tadanulomikaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā bhikkhūnam tad anucchavikam tad anulomikam dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca
saṅgha suṭṭhutāya saṅgha phāsu tāya pe

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Navaṁ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena tiṇṇaṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṁ aññataraṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṁ
analyzed: navam pana bhikkhunā cīvara lābhena tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānaṃ aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇa

original: ādātabbaṁ—nīlaṁ vā kaddamaṁ vā kāḷasāmaṁ vā. Anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇaṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṁ
analyzed: ādātabba nīlam vā kaddamam vā kāḷasāmam vā anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇāna

original: aññataraṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṁ navaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇam navam cīvaram paribhuñjeyya pācittiyanti
tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānam aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇam ādātabbanti

original: Anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇaṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṁ aññataraṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇanti
analyzed: anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānaṃ aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇanti

original: antamaso kusaggenapi anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṁ aññataraṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṁ navaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: antamasaḥ kusaggena api an ādiyitvā tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānam aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇam navam cīvaram paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
an ādinne an ādinna saññī paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
an ādinne vematikaḥ paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
an ādinne ādinna saññī paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
ādinne an ādinna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
kappa katena a kappa katam sa sibbitam hoti
